  "summary": "Data Analyst with 3+ years in software development and a Full Stack Data Science and AI certification. Skilled in data cleaning, analysis, visualization, and machine learning. Proficient in Python, SQL, and dashboard creation to derive actionable insights. Aiming to leverage data expertise to drive business growth and decision-making.",

  ],

      "issuer": "Almabetter",
      "date": "March 2024",
      "link": "https://verified.sertifier.com/en/verify/51362150307752/"
    },

      "date": "May 2018",
      "link": "https://drive.google.com/file/d/1V7z9TpB0UT7HwsPsRxoI_dF4vNijUxr0/view?usp=sharing"
    },
    {
      "title": "Hadoop Development and Administration",
      "issuer": "I.S.M University",
      "date": "July 2016",
      "link": "https://drive.google.com/file/d/1J4w0t_OJ6CC7_BERXXocrPnhVpMa3Oj3/view?usp=sharing"
    }
  ],
  "skills": {
    "programming_languages_and_tools": [
      "Python 4.2",
      "SQL 4.4",
      "PowerBI 4.5",
      "Tableau 4",
      "Excel 4",
      "GitHub 4.5",
      "Machine Learning",
      "Statistics",
      "NLP"
    ],
    "platforms": [
      "Google Colab",
      "pgAdmin4",
      "MySQL",
      "PostgreSQL",

    ],
    "frameworks": [

      "Seaborn",
      "BeautifulSoup"
    ]
  },
  "languages": [
    "English",
    "Hindi",
    "Kannada"
  ],
  "interests": [
    "Jogging",
    "Badminton",
    "Gourmet Food"
  ],
  "experience": [
    {
      "company": "Crescent Technosoft",
      "role": "Software Developer",
      "location": "Bangalore",
      "start_date": "October 2021",
      "end_date": "Present",
      "responsibilities": [
        "Executed the creation of visually appealing and user-friendly website interfaces, aligning with client specifications and project goals.",
        "Contributed to designing and implementing key features, ensuring adherence to coding standards and project timelines.",
        "Developed and conducted software development training sessions for college students, covering essential programming languages and development tools."
      ]
    },
    {
      "company": "Almabetter",
      "role": "Data Analyst Trainee",
      "start_date": "March 2023",
      "end_date": "Present",
      "responsibilities": [
        "Performed data cleaning and analysis with Pandas and NumPy, using Python and SQL for data extraction and visualization.",
        "Skilled in business intelligence and data visualization using tools like Power BI and Tableau to communicate insights and support decision-making effectively.",
        "Implemented predictive models for clustering using Python and basic machine learning techniques to identify patterns and group data effectively."
      ]
    }
  ],
  "projects": [
    {
      "title": "Google Play Store Data Analysis",
      "date": "Feb 2024",
      "verified": true,
      "details": [
        "Ensured data accuracy through data cleaning and preprocessing using Python, Pandas and NumPy, focusing on outlier detection and missing data handling.",
        "Utilized statistical methods to identify correlations between app features, user ratings, and download numbers, providing actionable insights for app optimization.",
        "Created visualizations and dashboard using Matplotlib and Tableau."
      ],
      "tech_stack": [
        "Python",
        "Pandas",
        "NumPy",
        "Data Preprocessing",
        "Data Visualization",
        "Tableau"
      ],
      "repo": "https://github.com/shakirsayeed/PlayStore_DataAnalysis.git"
    },
    {
      "title": "Netflix Movies & TV Shows - Clustering (Unsupervised Learning)",
      "date": "March 2024",
      "verified": true,
      "details": [
        "Conducted EDA on 7,000+ Netflix dataset to uncover trends in content type, genre distribution, and release patterns.",
        "Implemented K-Means Clustering to group similar movies and TV shows based on attributes like genre and release year.",
        "Prepared data for text clustering by cleaning fields, removing stop words, and extracting relevant keywords.",
        "Applied Feature Engineering techniques to improve clustering accuracy."
      ],
      "tech_stack": [
        "Python",
        "Data Preprocessing",
        "Machine Learning",
        "Feature Engineering"
      ],
      "repo": "https://github.com/shakirsayeed/Netflix_Movies_-%20_TV_shows_Clustering_Unsupervised_Learning.git"
    },
    {
      "title": "Unveiling COVID-19 Dynamics in India Through Excel Dashboard Analytics",
      "date": "March 2025",
      "verified": true,
      "details": [
        "Performed Data Cleaning and preprocessing on dataset, addressing missing values and adding custom columns.",
        "Designed a COVID-19 dashboard in Excel using pivot tables, functions and charts to analyze trends.",
        "Formulated KPIs such as daily new cases, active cases, CFR, and vaccination coverage.",
        "Forecasted future trends using Excel trendlines."
      ],
      "tech_stack": [
        "Microsoft Excel",
        "Pivot Tables",
        "Charts",
        "Formulas"
      ],
      "repo": "https://github.com/shakirsayeed/COVID-19-in-India-Through-Excel-DashboardAnalytics.git"
    },
    {
      "title": "Unveiling Insights in the Movie Industry Through Data Analysis using PowerBI",
      "date": "March 2025",
      "verified": true,
      "details": [
        "Performed data cleaning and preprocessing, addressing missing values and transforming columns.",
        "Merged production and revenue datasets using Power BI.",
        "Utilized DAX queries to create custom Measures and Columns like Profitability, ROI, Ratings, Genres, Star Rating, and Total Revenue impact.",
        "Created interactive Dashboard for financials, audience ratings, and genre trends."
      ],
      "tech_stack": [
        "Power BI",
        "Data Preprocessing",
        "DAX Queries",
        "Power Query Editor",
        "Charts",
        "Dashboard"
      ],
      "repo": "https://github.com/shakirsayeed/Movie-Industry-Through-Power-BI-Data-Analysis.git"
    }
  ]
}
}

values.content:
You are in system role; you are a professional job match score evaluator
Calculate the Job Match Score using the following method:
-Extract skills from the job title and company(e.g., Python, SQL, Microsoft Excel,Microsoft Power Bi). (provided below)
-Extract skills from the candidate's resume(provided below).
- Use cosine similarity between the candidate's skills vector and the job requirement vector.
-Higher Overlap = higher score

=Job Title and Company :

=You are a professional cover letter writer and job fit evaluator.
Generate only the following output (no JSON, no metadata, no extra explanations):
1. A personalized, properly formatted, professional cover letter for a {{ $('Fetching Job Fields').item.json.title }} at {{ $('Fetching Job Fields').item.json.company_name }} in {{ $('Fetching Job Fields').item.json.location }}.
-Begin with the candidate's contact details (provided below) at the top(Name, Email, Phone, LinkedIn).
-Insert todays date ({{$now.format("DD")}}).
-Follow the standard cover letter format:
Date, Recipient Details, Greeting, Body, Closing
-The body should be 300- 350 words, enthusiastic, detailed, and tailored to 
{{ $('Fetching Job Fields').item.json.company_name }}.
- Highlight the most relevant experiences, skills, certifications, and projects from the candidate's resume
-Demonstrate enthusiasm, impact, and alignment with {{ $('Fetching Job Fields').item.json.company_name }}'s mission.
-End with "Sincerely, [candidate's Name]".

Here is the Candidate details

Data Analyst with 3+ years in software development and a Full Stack Data Science and AI
certification. Skilled in data cleaning, analysis, visualization, and machine learning. Proficient in
Python, SQL, and dashboard creation to derive actionable insights. Aiming to leverage data
expertise to drive business growth and decision-making.
Experience
Crescent Technosoft October 2021 - Present
Bangalore
 Software Developer
Executed the creation of visually appealing and user-friendly website interfaces, aligning
with client specifications and project goals.
Contributed to designing and implementing key features, ensuring adherence to coding
standards and project timelines.
Developed and conducted software development training sessions for college students,
covering essential programming languages and development tools
Almabetter March 2023- Present
 Data Analyst Trainee
Performed data cleaning and analysis with Pandas and NumPy, using Python and SQL for
data extraction and visualization.
Skilled in business intelligence and data visualization using tools like Power BI and Tableau
to communicate insights and support decision-making effectively.
Implemented predictive models for clustering using Python and basic machine learning
techniques to identify patterns and group data effectively.
Projects
Google Play Store Data Analysis Feb 2024
 Almabetter Verified Project
Ensured data accuracy through data cleaning and preprocessing using Python, Pandas and
NumPy, focusing on outlier detection and missing data handling.
Utilized statistical methods to identify correlations between app features, user ratings, and
download numbers, providing actionable insights for app optimization.
Created visualizations and dashboard using toolslike Matplotlib and Tableau to present
findings clearly and compellingly.
Python, Pandas, NumPy, Data Preprocessing, Data Visualization, Tableau
Netflix Movies & TV_shows-Clustering_Unsupervised_Learning March 2024
 Almabetter Verified Project
Conducted Exploratory Data Analysis (EDA) on 7,000+ Netflix dataset to uncover trends in
content type, genre distribution, and release patterns, forming a basis for clustering,
including handling null values and standardizing formats.
Implemented K-Means Clustering to group similar movies and TV shows based on
attributes like genre and release year, leveraging unsupervised learning.
Prepared data for text clustering by cleaning fields, removing stop words, and extracting
relevant keywords to improve clustering accuracy.
Applied Feature Engineering techniques to improve clustering accuracy by enhancing both
model performance and visualization of clusters.
Developed insightful visualizations using Seaborn and Matplotlib to interpret cluster
characteristics and reveal meaningful information
Python, Data Preprocessing, Machine Learning, Feature Engineering
Unveiling COVID-19 Dynamics in India Through Excel Dashboard Analytics March 2025
 Almabetter Verified Project
Performed Data Cleaning and preprocessing on a dataset. Addressed missing values,
transformed columns, and adding custom columns for analytical purposes.
Designed a COVID-19 dashboard in Excel using pivot tables , Functions and charts to
analyze trends in cases, vaccinations, and testing.
Formulated KPIs such as daily new cases, active cases, CFR, and vaccination coverage.
Forecasted future trends using Excel trendlines.
Microsoft Excel, Pivot Tables, Charts, Formulas
Unveiling Insights in the Movie Industry Through Data Analysis using PowerBI March 2025
 Almabetter Verified Project
Performed data cleaning and preprocessing. Addressed missing values, transformed
columns. Merged production and revenue datasets using Power BI.
Utilized DAX queries to create custom Measures and Columns like Profitability, ROI, ratings,
genres, Star Rating and Total Revenue impact.
Created interactive Dashboard for financials, audience ratings, and genre trends.
Power BI, Data Preprocessing, DAX Queries, Power Query Editor, Charts, Dashboard
